base_news_prompt.task: Rewrite the main idea of the text briefly, without emotions and objectively, so that the presented information is perceived neutrally and without implications as a Clear News
base_news_prompt.analysis_requirements: Analyze the text for the possibility of deliberately embedded psychological pressure. Determine whether the text aims to influence a person to change or form a specific opinion regarding the actions or organizations described in it
base_news_prompt.tags_requirements: Add tags related to the persons, organizations, etc., mentioned in the text
base_news_prompt.facts_requirements: Summarize the key facts presented in the text concisely
